title: Energy Khata
description: A mobile application for tracking and managing energy consumption, built with Kotlin for Android.

title: CSL Project
description: Full-stack application with TypeScript frontend and Java backend for CSL management system.

title: Cricket Captain 2023
description: A cricket simulation game built in Java with game management and team strategy features.

title: Smart TimeTable
description: An intelligent timetable scheduling system with mobile and server components for educational institutions.

title: Kon Banega Crorepati
description: A KBC-inspired quiz game with 100 questions across 10 categories, 3 lifelines (SSH, 50/50, Public Opinion), animated BGI graphics, and randomized gameplay. Built in C with Turbo C BGI Graphics.
